snippet: By using his own money for his campaign, strategists say Mr. Trump is hurting the Republicans’ building of digital troves for the general election.
abstract: Political strategists are raising concerns about Donald J Trump's lack of interest in building trove of data about his donors, volunteers and supporters, which is outgrowth of his insistence that he needs no donations to pursue his presidential ambitions; warn dearth of voter data could harm his general election chances and will likely harm Republican Party.
lead_paragraph: By using his own money for his campaign, strategists say Mr. Trump is hurting the Republicans’ building of digital troves for the general election.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s ‘Self-Funding’ Stalls G.O.P. in Donor-Data Collection
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Self-Funding Puts a Crimp in G.O.P. Data Collection
